review_text: Lokasi bagus dekat pantai, fasilitas oke, ada kolam renang, staff sangat ramah dan membantu

If you want a getaway from it all place, this is it. It‚Äôs a surfer beach with a handful of warungs, bars and hotel restaurants. Most are perched on cliffs overlooking the sparkling black sands. The nearby area has no mini-marts or money changers, so come prepared if you are a cash person like me. Hotel Gubug has a great pool and a friendly staffed bar and restaurant. Rooms are basic but adequate. If you are a 5 star honcho then spend your mega bucks elsewhere, but for me who wanted a getaway, this is perfect‚Ä¶
Me and my boyfriend love this places

If you are there to surf then this hotel has a pool with a view of the wave. Certain rooms can see the wave as well and my partner saw me catch a wave while still lying in bed. Friendly staff and nice location.
Had a great time staying as usual, wayan and dewi are great to deal with see you guys soon üëå
clean friendly staff opposite beach  close to restaurants

Balian Beach is my favourite place in Bali so I love every single thing  that is located there including this accommodation. Friendly, 24/7, clean, modern, great view, hot water, cozy, wifi. Thank you so much for the great service! ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è

Good location ,close to surf
Had a fan room , basic for a night or 2, short walk to the pool 30 metres
Me and my husband love thiss placesssss.. ‚ù§Ô∏è
Me and my partner loved this places..
Great location. Pool is wonderful.  Great view.  Restaurant has good food. Staff are all friendly.

Overlooks pleasant garden and a big lap pool. And the ocean waves.unfortunately a storm wiped out the wifi for a few days,but eventually they got a new router going.Rooms don't have bedside cupboards.
Definitely value for money ! The staff were awesome and the food and drinks are very affordable and fairly priced. We would and definitely will return ! Only thing is beds are slightly uncomfortable
This good places with nice view.
Quite a nice place great value and great location I will definitely stay here again.

A great room in front of the ocean, breathtaking view. The pool and sunbath seats are amazing, the breakfast is so good. We add a really good time there, didn‚Äôt want to leave. A little effort would be good on cleanliness :)
Room was clean.  Great location.

The view from the pool and the bar is really beautiful to watch the surfers. The rooms were not that much clean, there was no hot water and really weak water pressure. the construction all the mornings

The property could use a bit of updating but it was clean, affordable, and close to all the action.

Be sure to check that you get an AC room when you book
Hotel location is next to the beach. You can hear sound of waves from the hotel. Perfect for transit if you travel from gilimanuk, its about 1.5 hours from harbour

The rooms were too hot, even with a fan. The mattress was also really terrible. 
The only thing I really enjoyed was the food at the restaurant.

Great location. Staff is very kind and also accommodating. There was a very extremely loud club blasting loud music right behind this
place. Not their  fault at all but kept many of us up until about 1 am.

great spot 
great pool 
room basic but all i need
really enjoyed my stay 1 week
thank you Gubug
We had an amazing stay in Gubug, beautiful accomodation, which is clean and comfy. Breakfast is great everyday. Location is perfect over looking the beach and surf! Staff are wonderful
Very good location, nice rooms and friendly staff. Will go again, Suksma üíö
Always great
Was fantastic
Great if you want to get out of the hustle and bustle of Denpasar.

The view, the view from the pool, the view from the pool while drinking a beer.... All of it. Across the street from a great restaurant with reasonable and 10 min walk down the road from great night time street food.
Excellent location. Great place to stay.

They have clearly been reading reviews and taken on feedback. Rooms come with a fridge now, and the pool they have built has a stunning view of the surf break. 
Rooms are quiet (each room
building is individual), well sealed so mosquitos weren‚Äôt an issue, clean and fresh linen daily. Photos don‚Äôt do justice. 
The garden is tended to daily and is mature and lovely. All rooms face the ocean (we stayed in 11 and could see the surf from bed.) And it‚Äôs all only 1 minute walk to the beach. 
Definitely the best value for money for well-equipped room, and best pool in Balian. 
Unfortunately the restaurant hadn‚Äôt  reopened since covid when we visited, but hopefully it does in the future as I heard from return travellers it was the best in town.
Great location but rooms need refurbishment
Best place to stay in Balian!

Great spot to stay if you are a surfer, amazing pool and beautiful gardens, if you book sea view room get the end or one next door hopefully they will cut the palm trees and other tree's back soon otherwise you won't get a view, great restaurant next door as wasn't much open as alot of places still closed for Covid, highly recommend.
Will come back for sure.
Excellent Veiw from all rooms , a beautiful place to stay and enjoy the little surf village üíó
a great  place  to stay  for  surfing  at balian  overlooking  the break

Stayed in room 10 with ocean views and it was better than expected regarding other peoples photos. Room was spacious and just needed a fridge. Staff left you alone, which I don't  have a problem with. Great pool with ocean views.. ample breakfast... good location short distance to some good warungs for food, juice and ofc bintangs..

Lovely place to stay, with the best view. We stayed upstairs for the view for $5 more, but when we got there , we could've stayed below as the view was great from down stairs also. Rooms aren't very big but big enough!! . There is a double and a single bed. We would wake up to a beautiful view from the bed each morning. There is no kettle or fridge in the room.
Breakfast was basic but very tasty. The garden is beautiful  which gives the hotel a lovely feel. There are lots of restaurants nearby and a lovely coffee shop just on road behind hotel, that make the best coffee!! There isn't a great deal todo in Balian but chill,. It was wonderful to get out of the busy part of Bali. This place is a gem! and so quiet, but Balian is getting busy so I want to enjoy it before it changes.
I definitely will back again next year. My only issue is the beds are very hard and the pool is too strong with chemicals which made swimming uncomfortable and burnt my eyes, but I did mention it so ...
Comfortable room, staff were helpful and friendly, great location, I'll be back
Great view, staff. Breakfast could be better and bring your own pillow but the view is to die for and the pool is lovely. I'd stay again.

First thing you notice is that the photos online don't do it justice. Their garden is beautiful and fully grown! The staff are friendly and helpful and caring. The room itself has a very comfortable queen bed and 2 great puffy pillows!! :) Air con was new unit and worked well. The bathroom was the only part holding it back from better rating. Toilet was right next to shower which was a simple shower head on a hose attached to the wall. Nonetheless the water was hot and quickly too even though you preferred the cool water :p Only provided soap so you might want to bring shampoo.
Wifi was decent reception but drop outs happened a lot so no online calls but everything was good :)
Definitely going back there. For the price that included breakfast and the location was perfect. Plus the pool over looking the beach was brilliant to chill by after big surf sessions.

Location was excellent, good relaxing spot by the pool over looking the ocean, aircon wasn't as cold as we would have liked it to be, bed was very loud, also no hot water but didn't bother us as it was always hot!! Would stay again though, great price!

The staff at Gubug are very caring and helpful. The location is great - maybe 30 meters from the bottom of the road to the beach. There are about 3 single rooms and 6 two-storey rooms arranged in an L-shape.  Rooms are pretty new. My only issue is that the room I had (room 1) was really dark. The floor covering and walls are all dark tile and brick throughout. The lighting is poor. Without opening the front window curtains, there is very little light in this room. Made if difficult to get ready for the wedding I was attending. Other than that it was comfortable, safe, and a nice place to stay. They are building a pool at the moment that will be an infinity pool overlooking the ocean. That will be a great addition to this hotel.

Amazing place , If you are looking for a quiet place to surf and relax away from the fuss of Bali, come here, I recommend staying in the triple room with sea views, it has air conditioning and a fridge . Plus the seaviews with the pool, the sunset... You can rent a motorcycle in the same place, on the main road you have some small markets and ATMs‚Ä¶I‚Äôll back for sure
Belle adresse...terimah kasih üôèüíô
Super , salle de bain √† rafra√Æchir

Hotel un peu ancien mais bien r√©nov√© chambre moderne. Parc entretenu et piscine bien propre. Pour y acc√©der il faut d abord entrer dans le temple et payer l entr√©e. Id√©al √©galement pour y rester plusieurs jours car on ne paie alors qu un seul billet d entr√©e celui de l arriv√©e du premier jour. Site tr√®s joli et agr√©able .
Tr√®s joli h√¥tel vue sur la mer incroyable piscine √† d√©bordement superbe.

I had a really pleasant stay in this hotel. The room is spacious, clean, with a big balcony ! 
It's perfectly situated, 2 min walk from the beach  and the view from the hotel's restaurant is very beautiful, and also the pool is just amazing !
Staff is friendly and welcoming. 
I would definitively advice you to come here !

La photo sur internet ne mentait pas, la vue sur l'oc√©an est √©poustouflante. Mais ma chambre √©tait sale, le robinet de la douche bloqu√© par le calcaire notamment. J'ai pris ma douche avec des tongues... Je suppose que les occupants pr√©c√©dents de la chambre √©taient un troupeau d'√©l√©phants en entrainement de saut au trampoline vu l'√©tat de la literie.
Certes, j'avais choisi un √©tablissement simple, mais simplicit√© ne rime pas forc√©ment avec salet√©
Bestes Hostel in dem ich bisher war.

Jauh dari keramaian, teduh, dan nyaman mendengar deburan ombak
Pemandangan sangat bagus

Staff terbaik 
Senang menginap susana hening deket sama pantai 
Kebersihannya ok
Cuma gak ada hot water aja 
Harga terbaik next kesana lagi
Kamar hotel lumayan bersih ada AC ada non AC viewnya bagus dekat laut ada kolam renang juga breakfast nya enak
everything is good except the internet...the connection is on and off
Datang disambut penjaga, bisa bayar ditempat, diantar ke kamar. Dekat dengan pantai, sesuai dengan budget
Sangat cocok untuk istirahat, suasana tenang. Masih tedengar suara ombak.
Top markotop nginep disini
Not recomended, staf kurang ramah. Tdk ada wi fi, kamar bau dan tdk ada resto atau warung di sekitar.

Hotel yg sangat nyaman dengan pemqndangan desa khas bali dan pemandangan laut yg indah. Staf hotel yg ramah serta kamar hotel yg bersih. Parkir yg luas dan taman yg asri.  Tersedia kamar hotel dengqn harga terjangkau dengan fasilitas yg baik,tanpa AC nanmun tersedia kipas angin dan water hitter.
Kamarnya luas..kamar mandi bersih tp fungsk showernya ga maksimal,dan harusnya di kamar ada ketel utk pemanas air

Penginapan ini keren banget dapet view laut , dekat dengan pantai dengan pasir hitam yang halus, pesan kamar dengan triple bed, kamar bersih, untuk menu sarapan ok lah , yang pasti staff nya ramah2 walau kita turis lokal üôè
Lantai kotor penuh debu, lampu teras mati, kipas angin tidak nyala remote tv tidak ada baterai, lantai kamar mandi kotor debu,air asin, kebersihan kurang, bos nya tidak mengerti hospitality

Saya menginap semalam disini. Kolam renang bagus meskipun tidak besar, view hadap pantai, kebanyakan turis luar mungkin hanya saya yg turis lokal disana.. suasana hening, adem, banyak pohon.. hanya saja harga terlalu mahal, apalagi cukup jauh dari bandara, pantaimya juga berpasir hitam dan agak kotor sedikit...overall pelayanan bagus,bersih,ada wifi..

So nice place for staying ) 

Location is perfect. Local cafes are close, wild beaches are everywhere, ocean is incredible.

I'll be back very soon )

Staff and Location were awesome. 
Price a little on the expensive side,  but we booked late so that might have influenced the price!

I stayed in a room with a fan, with use of facilities -nice pool. Breakfast not included. Lots of eating places around. Surfers beach with black sand and round stones very near by Current quite strong. Cautious for swimmers..overall Gubug was good for the price and staff very friendly
We really enjoyed our time at Gubug Balian. The kids loved the pool and enjoyed playing with the othe hotel guest kids. Spectacular views of the Balian surf break. Staff were nice and very helpful.
Stunning views from our room. Great location in Balian. Horizon pool overlooking the waves. Rooms are basic but for the location and pool it was totally ok. Would stay again if we go back to Balian.
